mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.people, r.totalprice AS totalprice, r.classday, r.classtime FROM reservation r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT r.reseq, r.userid, r.cseq, r.people, r.classtime, r.classday, r.totalprice, r.payment, r.endedclass, p.title FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.cseq = p.cseq where not r.payment=''
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservation WHERE reseq = #{reseq} and not payment=''
